text:
Purepoint - https://purepoint.io

We are a software product company currently working on an exciting IOT project in partnership with a household name - with hundreds of thousands of active users. You will be working with our existing, small, remote teams.

REMOTE | Full time | Europe (GMT +2/-2):

Node.js - http://careers.purepoint.io/apply/Za01JLKRYD/Javascript-Engi...

Ruby - http://careers.purepoint.io/apply/50pAFmjwly/Ruby-Engineer

iOS - http://careers.purepoint.io/apply/MYfU4LOIRg/IOS-Developer

Android - http://careers.purepoint.io/apply/stGSbmjB9Y/Android-Develop...

REMOTE | Full time | North America / Canada (Central / East coast preferred):

Ruby - http://careers.purepoint.io/apply/QcTk0xKOjL/Ruby-Developer
